org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.data.elasticsearch

类 ElasticsearchDataAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.data.elasticsearch.ElasticsearchDataAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @ConditionalOnClass(value={<error>,<error>})
 @AutoConfigureAfter(value=ElasticsearchAutoConfiguration.class)
public class ElasticsearchDataAutoConfiguration
extends Object
    Auto-configuration for Spring Data's Elasticsearch support.

    Registers an ElasticsearchTemplate if no other bean of the same type is configured.

    从以下版本开始:
    1.1.0
    另请参阅:
    EnableElasticsearchRepositories
